Symbol.Script_UI:
! call with bRoofMaker = true for roofmaker elements' Display Lumber Size tabpage ! dt = true for enabling text style parameters ! call with bRoofMaker = false for non-roofmaker elements' Text Style tabpage ! dt is also an input parameter in this case
!Positions for UI elements x1 = 0 x2 = 168 x3 = 170 x4 = 370 x5 = 266 x6 = 273
_yCurr = pageStartY _dy = 24 _infHeight = 19 _outfHeight = 15 _offsetY = 4
if not(bRoofMaker) then if bIsTextDisplay then ui_style 0, 1 ui_infield{3} "dt", x1, _yCurr - _offsetY, x2-x1, _infHeight, 7, "", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, "",`Текст`, 0, "",`Текст`, 1 ui_style 0, 0
if bParName_stDisplayText then ui_infield "stDisplayText", x3, _yCurr - _offsetY, x4-x3, _infHeight else ui_infield "txt", x3, _yCurr - _offsetY, x4-x3, _infHeight endif _yCurr = _yCurr + _dy else ui_style 0, 1 ui_outfield `Стиль Текста`, x1, _yCurr, 444, _outfHeight ui_style 0, 0
_yCurr = _yCurr + _dy endif endif
ui_outfield `Тип Шрифта`, x1, _yCurr, x2-x1, _outfHeight, 4*not(dt) ui_infield "fontType", x3, _yCurr - _offsetY, x4-x3, _infHeight
_yCurr = _yCurr + _dy
ui_outfield `Размер Шрифта`, x1, _yCurr, x2-x1, _outfHeight, 4*not(dt) if bParName_FontSize then ui_infield "fontSize", x3, _yCurr - _offsetY, x5-x3, _infHeight else ui_infield "fsz", x3, _yCurr - _offsetY, x5-x3, _infHeight endif _yCurr = _yCurr + _dy
ui_outfield `Стиль Шрифта`, x1, _yCurr, x2-x1, _outfHeight, 4*not(dt) ui_infield{3} "gs_text_style_bold", x3, _yCurr - _offsetY, 21, _infHeight, 6, "ui_bold_flat(1)", 1, 1, 16, 16, 16, 16, 1, "", 0, 1, "", 1 ui_infield{3} "gs_text_style_italic", x3 + 25, _yCurr - _offsetY, 21, _infHeight, 6, "ui_italic_flat(1)", 1, 1, 16, 16, 16, 16, 1, "", 0, 1, "", 1 ui_infield{3} "gs_text_style_underline", x3 + 2*25, _yCurr - _offsetY, 21, _infHeight, 6, "ui_underline_flat(1)", 1, 1, 16, 16, 16, 16, 1, "", 0, 1, "", 1
if bStrikeText then ui_infield{3} "gs_text_style_strike", x3 + 3*25, _yCurr - _offsetY, 21, _infHeight, 6, "ui_text_strikethrough_flat(1)", 1, 1, 16, 16, 16, 16, 1, "", 0, 1, "", 1 endif
_yCurr = _yCurr + _dy
ui_outfield `Цвет Пера`, x1, _yCurr, x2-x1, _outfHeight, 4*not(dt) if not(bRoofMaker) then if bParName_PenText then _stParName = "penText" else _stParName = "tpen" endif else _stParName = "txt_pen" endif ui_infield _stParName, x3, _yCurr - _offsetY, 33, _infHeight
if biTextPen then ui_infield "iTextPen", x3 + 38, _yCurr - _offsetY, 33, _infHeight endif
_yCurr = _yCurr + _dy
if bOrientationShortName then _orientationTitle = `Ориентация` else _orientationTitle = `Ориентация в Символе` endif
ui_outfield _orientationTitle, x1, _yCurr, x2-x1, _outfHeight, 4*not(dt) ui_infield{3} "typeTextRotation_m", x3, _yCurr - _offsetY, x5-x3, _infHeight, 8, "", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, `Читаемый`, 2, 0, `Всегда Горизонтально`, 1, 0, `Выровнять по Символу`, 0
_yCurr = _yCurr + _dy
if bTextPos then if bRoofMaker then _stParNameX = "txt_pos_x" _stParNameY = "txt_pos_y" else _stParNameX = "txtx" _stParNameY = "txty" endif
ui_outfield `Расположение по X`, x1, _yCurr, x2-x1, _outfHeight, 4*not(dt) ui_infield _stParNameX, x3, _yCurr - _offsetY, x5-x3, _infHeight
_yCurr = _yCurr + _dy
ui_outfield `Расположение по Y`, x1, _yCurr, x2-x1, _outfHeight, 4*not(dt) ui_infield _stParNameY, x3, _yCurr - _offsetY, x5-x3, _infHeight
_yCurr = _yCurr + _dy endif
